function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the building, affecting occupants' health and safety.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of ventilation systems, adjustment of CO2 setpoints, and use of air-cleaning devices.","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation, DCV control systems, air-cleaning devices, UV cleaning equipment.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially in areas with epidemic spread.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Lack of regular inspection and maintenance of water seals leading to potential water leaks and ingress of contaminants.","Impact":"Increased risk of waterborne diseases, such as Legionnaires' disease, and deterioration of indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of water seals, use of proper sealants, and immediate repair of leaks.","Technologies":"Water seal inspection tools, sealant materials, leak detection systems.","People":"Occupants of the building, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance team."},{"Description":"Inadequate control of temperature and relative humidity leading to suboptimal conditions for disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to infection and spread of contagious diseases due to unsuitable temperature and humidity levels.","Mitigation":"Monitoring and control of temperature and relative humidity, use of air conditioning and humidification systems, relocation of air-cleaning devices.","Technologies":"Thermostats, humidifiers, air conditioning systems, air-cleaning devices.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially in areas with epidemic spread.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff."}]}
